channel.title: Model issue "character is visible"
channel.description:
Hello coders i added vanguard and other armours but when i wear "helmets" and "bodys" my character being visible true it is there way how to fix it? all legs are fine only bodys and helmets do problems please help me out there is picture of "Vanguard"
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/27x2esi.png[/img]

item.title: Model issue "character is visible"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

We’re not “coders”, we’re programmers…

Add the items server sided and that may help.

You need to declare the helm as a fullhat. And you need to declare the body as a fullBody.
Should be in like Item.java or ItemAssistant.java

have fun.

Read full topic
